rows.name: Illumina (174k)
rows.description: Catalog of 174k loci that are polymorphic in the 2,504 samples from the 1000 Genomes Project

rows.name: GangSTR v17 (1.3M)
rows.description: The latest genome-wide STR catalog from the GangSTR github repo

rows.name: HipSTR (1.6M)
rows.description: The latest genome-wide STR catalog from the HipSTR reference github repo

rows.name: Known Disease-Causing (60)
rows.description: TR loci known to be associated with Mendelian diseases

rows.name: New TRF: pure repeats ≥ 6bp (9.2M)
rows.description: Catalog of 9.2 million pure repeat loci including homopolymers computed by running TandemRepeatFinder on hg38 with very large (=1000000) mismatch and indel penalties followed by filtering to loci that span at least 6bp.

rows.name: New TRF: pure repeats ≥ 9bp (4.4M)
rows.description: Catalog of 4.4 million pure repeat loci including homopolymers computed by running TandemRepeatFinder on hg38 with very large (=1000000) mismatch and indel penalties followed by filtering to loci that span at least 9bp.

rows.name: New TRF: repeats ≥ 6bp (4.6M)
rows.description: Catalog of 4.6 million pure and impure repeat loci excluding homopolymers computed by running TandemRepeatFinder on hg38 with default (=7) mismatch and very large (=1000000) indel penalties followed by filtering to loci that span at least 6bp.

rows.name: New TRF: repeats ≥ 9bp (3.0M)
rows.description: Catalog of 3.0 million pure and impure repeat loci excluding homopolymers computed by running TandemRepeatFinder on hg38 with default (=7) mismatch and very large (=1000000) indel penalties followed by filtering to loci that span at least 9bp.

rows.name: popSTR (5.4M)
rows.description: Catalog of 5.4 million loci from https://github.com/DecodeGenetics/popSTR computed by running TandemRepeatFinder on hg38 with default parameters

rows.name: TRGT (171k)
rows.description: TRGT catalog of 171k loci from https://github.com/PacificBiosciences/trgt/tree/main/repeats. It represents a slightly filtered copy of the Illumina catalog.

rows.name: adotto (2.9M)
rows.description: Catalog from the GIAB preprint based on combining variuos other catalogs and then running TandemRepeatFinder on the combined repetative regions to resolve repeat coordinates.

rows.name: 36-mer mappability
rows.description: Mappability of 36-mers allowing for 2 mismatches. Generated using the same pipeline as the UCSC hg19 mappability tracks.

rows.name: 50-mer mappability
rows.description: Mappability of 50-mers allowing for 2 mismatches. Generated using the same pipeline as the UCSC hg19 mappability tracks.

rows.name: 75-mer mappability
rows.description: Mappability of 75-mers allowing for 2 mismatches. Generated using the same pipeline as the UCSC hg19 mappability tracks.

rows.name: 100-mer mappability
rows.description: Mappability of 100-mers allowing for 2 mismatches. Generated using the same pipeline as the UCSC hg19 mappability tracks.

rows.name: SegDups >1000 bases
rows.description: Duplications of >1000 Bases of Non-RepeatMasked Sequence downloaded from UCSC

rows.name: MANE v1
rows.description:
The Matched Annotation from NCBI and EMBL-EBI (MANE) project aims to produce a matched set of high-confidence transcripts that are identically annotated between RefSeq (NCBI) and Ensembl/GENCODE (led by EMBL-EBI). Transcripts for MANE are chosen by a combination of automated and manual methods based on conservation, expression levels, clinical significance, and other factors. Transcripts are matched between the NCBI RefSeq and Ensembl/GENCODE annotations based on the GRCh38 genome assembly, with precise 5' and 3' ends defined by high-throughput sequencing or other available data.

The current release (MANE v1.0) includes coverage of 99% of human protein-coding genes and 99.8% of genes of clinical relevance, including genes in the American College of Medical Genetics and Genomics (ACMG) Secondary Findings list (SF) v3.0. This release includes both MANE Select (19062) and MANE Plus Clinical (58) transcripts.
